title: Monocacy National Battlefield: Park Statistics
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Park Statistics              Park Statistics       Opened to Public:  July 13, 1991  Park Size:  1,647 acres  Visitors:  2011: 36,674 2010: 33,313 2009: 34,553 2008: 31,276 2007: 21,189 2006: 18,230  Budget (Fiscal Year): 2010: $1,575,000 2009: $1,480,000 2008: $1,406,000 2007: $1,257,000 2006: $1,029,500
